name: Phantasmalone
description:
You fell down and wake up deep into the catacombs, a friendly catacombs resident felt your loneliness and came to help you...

RECOMMENDED: Its recommended to play in fullscreen, I ran into some issues while importing to itch.

Endless Mode. Survive enemy waves.

Perform slashes with your ghost friend.

Controls:

- W A S D or arrow keys to move
- R to dodge
- Ghost follows your mouse

Mechanics Explain:

- Move your mouse around your desk and slash enemies, the faster you move the mouse the stronger the attack is.
- Attacking enemies makes the ghost consume stamina, run out of it and you will be defenseless.

ASSETS USED:

https://game-endeavor.itch.io/mystic-woods
https://szadiart.itch.io/rogue-fantasy-catacombs
https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Ghost sprite and animations were done by me.
